name: The Wheel of Time
summary: The Wheel of Time follows Moiraine, a member of the powerful, all-woman organization called the Aes Sedai, who goes on a journey across the world with five young people, one of whom she believes might be the reincarnation of a person prophesied to save or destroy humanity.
info:
